item.description:
NORTHEAST PREMIERE OF TRAPEZIUM!

A hilarious, whimsical new farce based on the old English tale of Tristan and Iseult. Henry Rathvon, a noted constructor of crossword puzzles for the New York Times and The Boston Globe, sets fabulous words of his own invention into a modern iambic pentameter. “A zany and verbally precocious retelling of the medieval romantic legend”
- Orlando Weekly.

Directed by Drama Desk Award Winner Russell Treyz

The CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show to extend the party

Details will be email to all CT Theatre Group Ticket Holders

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119

The CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show

Info will be emailed to all CT Theatre Group Ticket holders

Pick up your ticket before the show with the CT Theatre Group, or at the will call window

From I-84, east or west, take Exit 43 Park Road. At the end of the ramp, turn right. We are approximately one half mile on the left. From West Hartford Center, take South Main Street to Park Road and turn left. We are approximately 1 mile on the left.

Parking:
There is ample free parking on Park Road, Nesbit St., Price Blvd. and Washington Circle.
NOTE: Playhouse patrons are asked not to park in AC Petersen's parking lot, which is reserved for patrons of the restaurant.

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or CLICK HERE

Call (860) 987-7888
